content.title: Safai Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Safai Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015. The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing financial assistance for Maternity Assistance.
benefits: Female employees will receive a financial assistance of ₹4,200 in the third month of pregnancy and ₹2,800 in the eighth month of pregnancy as maternity benefit.
Male employees will receive a financial assistance of ₹3,000 as paternity leave after the birth of the child.
eligibility: Applicant(Male or Female) must be registered worker.
Benefits will be provided only for two children.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Safai Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing financial assistance for Maternity Assistance.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: 1. Female employees will receive a financial assistance of ₹4,200 in the third month of pregnancy and ₹2,800 in the eighth month of pregnancy as maternity benefit. 2. Male employees will receive a financial assistance of ₹3,000 as paternity leave after the birth of the child.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals and their family from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: For how many children can it be availed?
faqs.answer: Benefits will be provided only for two children.

faqs.question: Can either parent apply for this benefit?
faqs.answer: Either one can apply for the benefits.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: 1. All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. 2. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. 3. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do: 'Aavedan' Click next. 4. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. 5. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. 6. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: 1. All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. 2. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. 3. Provide the required details. 4. Fill out the application form. 5. Submit.
